snippet: The Heisman Trophy winner Johnny Manziel ran for two touchdowns and threw for two more as 10th-ranked Texas A&M wrapped up its first SEC season with a win at the Cotton Bowl.
abstract: Texas A&M defeats Oklahoma, 41-13, in college football's Cotton Bowl; Texas quarterback Johnny Manziel, Heisman Trophy winner, sets Football Bowl Subdivision bowl record with 229 yards rushing on 17 carries, and completing 22 of 34 passes for 287 yards.
lead_paragraph: The Heisman Trophy winner Johnny Manziel ran for two touchdowns and threw for two more as 10th-ranked Texas A&M wrapped up its first SEC season with a win at the Cotton Bowl.

headline.seo: Manziel Leads Texas A&M Over Oklahoma in Cotton Bowl
headline.main: Manziel Leads Aggies With 516 Total Yards
headline.print_headline: Manziel Leads Aggies With 516 Total Yards
